page.title: 01Yarm
page.content: The original town of Yarm is situated in a loop of the River Tees.It is an old market town and has been a settlement since the Iron-Age. There is also a lot of evidence connecting Yarm to its Norman past including a reference in the Domesday Book. Much of the present High Street was built during the Middle Ages when Yarm was a thriving port.Stockton then Middlesbrough had taken over that role but not before some of Yarm's business men made their mark on the industrial revolution.Their important contribution to the establishment of the railways is well known. Today Yarm is an attractive shopping centre and a rapidly expanding dormitory town for the nearby industrial centres.
